Header.title: Premier home services in the wasatach back

About.paragraph: Born and raised in Midway, Utah, I have always been deeply connected to the land and homes of this region. It was this great appreciation that led me to pursue a Bachelor’s Degree in Construction Management from Utah Valley University. My education and extensive background in construction has uniquely positioned me to understand the nuanced needs of homeowners, particularly those with second homes in Summit and Wasatch counties.
About.paragraph2: Today, my ethos for the company is simple: to offer homeowners fast communication, transparent services, and high integrity while ensuring properties are managed with the same care, precision, and attention to detail that I give to my own properties. My passion for understanding building systems coupled with a love for working with people, makes High West an efficient and valuable boutique outfit in the area.
About.paragraph3: As we continue to grow and evolve, my vision remains steadfast – to provide unparalleled property management services, melding my construction expertise with a personal understanding of the unique needs of each homeowner.
About.paragraph4: Our local and experienced team coupled with adventageous vendor relationships allows us to find the best fit solutions and resolve problems quickly. We love what we do and the people we work with.

Services.name: Home Inspection
Services.text: Ensure the safety, security, and upkeep of your property with our comprehensive home inspection service. Our team meticulously checks functionality of all building systems and completes a thorough walk through of the home. Inspections are performed on either weekly or bimonthly.

Services.name: Building Services
Services.text: From minor repairs to major renovations, we can handle it. The in-house maintenance technicians will address minor maintenance and repair. Our sister company Roth Build Group will tackle larger projects. They are led by Hunter Roth who is a licensed B100 General Contractor.

Services.name: Spa / Hot Tub Maintenance
Services.text: Keep your spa or hot tub in optimal working condition with our maintenance services. Certified technicians handle everything from cleaning and water quality checks to equipment inspection, ensuring a hassle-free experience every time you visit.

Services.name: Snow Removal
Services.text: Your home should be accessible no matter the time of year. We ensure clear driveways, walkways, and entrances, allowing you easy access to your property regardless of the weather. We'll also take care of any dangerous or excessive snow and icicles on the roof. The snow removal team strives to protect the exterior improvements of your home.

Services.name: Landscaping
Services.text: Maintain the health of your outdoor space with our functional landscaping services offered on a routine schedule or a la carte.

Services.name: Housekeeping
Services.text: Our team aims to provide a hotel grade service giving you a spotless and comfortable experience every time you visit.
